Best Buddies Qatar Celebration of World Down Syndrome Day
21  March,  2024
Best Buddies ambassadors from the Citizen Program participated in the World Down Syndrome Day celebration at the awareness corner in the Ramadan Bazaar at Pearl Island. Their participation was a practical application of this year's theme to end stereotypes about the group.
